ComicInfo.Summary: The Long Way Home Part 2: Sonja has been tossed overboard by the ghost pirates and Suumaro gives his life in casting a spell that enables her to breathe underwater. She fights a number of sea creatures before she ends up awakening the whale god that is responsible for the fate of the ghost pirates.
